subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description:
2012
AWP -Output 1:
Senior-level staff/officers at LMAs have skills to manage UNDP funded project under a National Implementation modality with gender balance representation  

AWP - Output 2
Micro assessment of implementing partners conducted and capacity gaps of IPs identified for training needs to facilitate transition to cash transfer modality. 

AWP-Output 3:
National Implementation Modality manual developed

AWP-Output 4:
Effective programme oversight and project management provided/maintained
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Support to Strenghtening Natio
